childMarkdownRemark.html:
• Spaghetti
  • Saucepan of boiling water
  • Food colouring
  • Washing up bowl or tray
  • Plastic toys

Cook spaghetti as normal bud add food colouring to the water. This will colour the spaghetti. When th spaghetti is cooked and cooled, place the spaghetti in a washing up bowl or tray for your child to explore.

The toys you use can determine what colour of food colouring you use. For example, blue could be used with ducks and sea creatures and green coold be used with farm animals which will encourage imaginative play.
